name: SafariBooks More Readable Code
description: Adjusts readability of inline code and code snippets. Otherwise some inline code would display too small. Uses better monospace fonts than Courier. (IMHO)
additional_info:
Mar 2013: Rel 0.01: Initial release
Mar 2013: Rel 0.02: Added #HtmlView .epub__text style, More San-serif heading styles
Feb 2014: Rel 0.03: Added section for font and text preferences. More sans-serif fonts, left text alignment, removing -webkit-filter invert() so that I can invert the entire site with another plug in.
Mar 2014: Rel 0.04: Add !important attribute to -webkit-filter: none, because sometimes it wouldn't work.
